Posts.Content: Oct 28, 2018 05:14PM cbmom3 wrote: I'm having my 3rd surgery on November 28th. Its my second reconstructive surgery after a bilateral mastectomy/reconstruction in June and axillary lymph node removal in July. I'm so tired of surgeries so I hope this will be my last! For all of those getting your mastectomies in November I wish you all the best of luck. It can be a slow recovery process but gets a little better every day.
Posts.Title: November 2018 Surgery Support Group evily RosieRed
